title: 38. Claudius’ Freedmen and Civil Service
description: An examination of Claudius’ reliance on freedmen, assessing their roles, power, wealth, and ancient criticisms of imperial administration.

questions.question: How do Suetonius and Dio Cassius generally portray Claudius’ freedmen?

options: They come from senatorial sources hostile to freedmen

questions.question: Why did Claudius rely heavily on freedmen in administration?
options: The scale of empire exceeded one man’s capacity

questions.question: What role did Claudius’ freedmen collectively form?
options: A civil service or imperial secretariat

questions.question: What does the term ‘institutionalised’ suggest about Claudius’ use of freedmen?
options: He formalised and expanded an existing practice
